skills.heading: 02. Skills

portfolio.heading: 03. Portfolio
portfolio.section-descrip: These are some of my works. To view the work, click on Live Preview, and to view the working code, click on GitHub Code.

contact.heading: 05. Contact
contact.section-descrip: If you have any suggestion, project or even you want to say Hello. please fill out the form below and I will reply you shortly.

sidebar.name: TALHAOUI SABIR
sidebar.bio: A programmer and freelancer with one year of experience in front-end development. I have developed multiple previous projects where I worked on designing and developing user interfaces using the React framework. You can see my previous projects and the code that I have created.
